pages.title: Frist Psot!
pages.text: All the content you know and love from "Writing to think," the WordPress blog that used to be at j.agrue.info, will be back soon. Who are you, anyway? Nobody read that, and nobody's likely reading this! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse facilisis consectetur risus nec gravida. In in finibus nisl.
